Orocos Namespace Reference

The project wide Orocos namespace contains all user classes of various projects. More...

Detailed Description

The project wide Orocos namespace contains all user classes of various projects.

When one writes 

 using namespace Orocos;

all classes from the RTT, KDL and BFL namespaces will be visible.
